channel.title: Oulu University on CS-AWARE-NEXT
channel.description: Recent content in Oulu University on CS-AWARE-NEXT

item.title: 3 questions – 3 answers Christmas 2022 edition: The second CS-AWARE-NEXT Podcast
item.description: 3 questions – 3 answers Christmas 2022 edition: The second CS-AWARE-NEXT Podcast We are happy to announce the second CS-AWARE-NEXT Podcast with Juha Röning! Juha is the Coordinator of the CS-AWARE-NEXT project and is Professor of Embedded Systems at the University of Oulu. Juha has also coordinated the original CS-AWARE project. He has three patents and has published more than 300 papers in the areas of computer vision, robotics, intelligent signal analysis, and software security.
